name: yurisprudence: whispers from the local library
name_original: yurisprudence: whispers from the local library
description:
Mercy without justice is the mother of dissolution; 
justice without mercy is cruelty
― Thomas Aquinas

A yuri visual novel about jurisprudence. 
Warning: This game is not recommended for children under 13. It contains strong language, written descriptions of crime, violence, human rights abuse, and discusses political themes. 

An epistolary romance about two law students.
Whether it's more about yuri or jurists is open to discussion in the existing doctrine.

Features:

  • ~8k words
  • three endings
  • one CG and two animations
  • ungodly amount of legalese
